Commission: 3.22% ON THE FIRST $100,000 PLUS 1.15% ON THE REMAINDER OF THE PURCHASE PRICE
Internet Remarks: Are you yearning for a peaceful place with lots of space to garden, or room for chickens? Or maybe you’d like a few bedrooms and a dedicated home office. Whatever your needs, this well-cared-for 4 bed, 2 bath home on a flat 1/4 acre lot, could be the one. Freshly painted inside with Hickory and Birch hardwood floors, brand new carpeting, and new kitchen appliances, it’s move-in ready. Outside, the mature rhododendrons will be putting on a spectacular show soon, and the mock orange and clematis will follow later with their multitudes of fragrant blooms. The fully fenced front and rear yards keep the deer out, and kids and dogs in. Get up early and take the trail around the corner down to Scarborough Beach and watch the sun come up over Howe Sound. Or marvel at the alpenglow on the snow-capped mountains at sunset. It’s just a quick drive to Snug Cove, and with easy access to the transit and school bus routes at the end of the street, this property provides a great opportunity for first time Buyers.
